initial_tool_thoughts.reasoning: No initial tool thoughts provided - consider which tools you'll need

execution_phase.description: Execute: Research Divi's internal structure, focusing on how it builds pages using shortcodes and stores layout data, to determine a viable automation strategy.
execution_phase.phase_guidance: Focus on careful implementation and testing

execution_evidence: Successfully researched Divi's internal architecture and layout storage system
Found that Divi uses shortcodes to store layout data (et_pb_section, et_pb_row, et_pb_module format)
Identified that Divi stores layouts in post_content as nested shortcodes with attributes
Discovered Divi 5.0 will move away from shortcodes to JSON-based storage format
Found Divi Builder API hooks and developer documentation for custom modules
Mapped out Divi's section/row/module hierarchy and global library system
Documented how Divi shortcodes can be used programmatically for automation
